updated_history.system:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

numerical_cols = ['Year', 'Month', 'DayofMonth', 'DayOfWeek', 'DepTime', 'CRSDepTime', 'ArrTime', 'CRSArrTime', 'ActualElapsedTime', 'CRSElapsedTime', 'AirTime', 'ArrDelay', 'DepDelay', 'Distance', 'TaxiIn', 'TaxiOut', 'Cancelled', 'Diverted', 'CarrierDelay', 'WeatherDelay', 'NASDelay', 'SecurityDelay', 'LateAircraftDelay']
corr_matrix = df[numerical_cols].corr()

plt.figure(figsize=(14, 12))
sns.heatmap(corr_matrix, annot=True, fmt=".2f", cmap='coolwarm')
plt.show()
